column1: #Text=Korra says : " Let 's hide in the attic . "
#Text=Mako says : " Uh , we 're not alone up here . "
#Text=Tarrlok says : " I do n't suppose you 're here to rescue me . "
#Text=Korra says : " We had no idea you were here .
#Text=" Korra says : " And what makes you so special ?
#Text=Amon is from the Northern Water Tribe .
#Text=He 's a waterbender and a bloodbender , just like I was .
#Text=" Mako says : " Did you know this all along ?
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " No , not until after he captured me .
